other_tests.findings: Positive to egg white, egg yolk, ovomucoid, wheat flour, barley flour, dust mites, and lysozyme; negative to a battery of pollen and molds.
Total serum IgE was 1142 kU/l. Specific IgE antibodies detected for various allergens.
Challenge to lysozyme elicited an early asthmatic response (22% fall in FEV1 in 10 min); challenge to alpha-amylase elicited a 24% fall in FEV1 in 20 min.
Positive with commercial garlic extract (15 mm) and fresh raw garlic (17.8 mm); negative with fresh cooked garlic.
Positive with raw garlic (urticaria); negative with cooked garlic.
Positive with raw garlic (generalized urticaria within 10 min); negative with cooked garlic.
Serum eotaxin level was higher in allergic rhinitis patients but not statistically significant.
Positive to Dermatophagoides and negative to other allergens; relationship noted with age and sex.
Tumor discovered in the left bronchi identified as carcinoid; histopathological analysis confirmed carcinoid tumor.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-lobectomy, patient free from previous symptoms for 1.5 years.

other_tests.findings: Negative for benzylpenicilloyl, fenoxymethylpenicilloyl, AX and ampicillin; positive IgE inferred through RAST.
Positive reaction to clavulanic acid; required further evaluation due to past reactions.
